entry.title: ROSEBURG HAS SPRINKLES SUNDAY, BUT ABOVE NORMAL HIGH TEMPERATURES ARE COMING

entry.title: Post offices closed for Juneteenth
entry.summary: USA — All United State Postal Service locations will be closed Wednesday in observance of the Juneteenth holiday; there will be no residential or mail delivery.

entry.title: City proclaims June as Pride Month followed by public testimony
